name: Google Translate
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Translate 节点。主要用于: Translate data using Google Translate

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: language

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: translate

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The input text to translate | (必填项)

translateTo.name: translateTo
translateTo.description: The language to use for translation of the input text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
translateTo.natural_language_description: 参数名: Translate To | 作用: The language to use for translation of the input text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)
